full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` THUN BZHI PA LNGA THUN NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @074A *, ,AOm SVA STI, SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO MA GCIG LAB SGRON DANG 'JAM DPAL DPA' BO RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PA, ,RTZA BA'I BLA MA 'JIGS MED BSTAN DAR ZHABS, ,DNGOS RGYUD BLA MA'I TSOGS LA GUS PAS 'DUD, ,DBEN SA @074B SNYAN RGYUD GDAN THOG GCIG MA 'DIS, ,LNGA TSAN GSUM GYI DON TSANG NGO MTSAR BA'I, ,GDAMS 'DIR MI SPRO MKHAS BLUN YOD MA YIN, ,YUL 'DI'I MKHAS 'GA'I 'THANG BAR MI SNANG RKYEN, ,KHYED GSUNG 'DI NYID PAR 'KHOR RUNG ZHUS GSOL, ,SHIN TU DGYES BZHIN LEGS SO BKA' STZAL TO, ,'BRI MKHAN DGE SLONG BRTZON 'GRUS DPAL BZANG DANG, ,BRKO MKHAN DGE SLONG BZOD PA GNYIS SGRUB MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL @075A *, ,'BYOR RTEN THOB CING, ,BLA MA'I ZHABS BRTEN BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PAS MCHOD, ,MKHA' SPYOD ZHING DU MYUR DU 'GRO BAR SHOG , ,,PAR 'DI BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BAR BYED, ,'GRO BA'I MGON PO ^ DZA YA PAndI TA'I, ,DGON PA DGA' LDAN DGE RGYAS GLING 'DIR BZHUGS, ,DE LTAR GYIS DGES RGYAL BSTAN PHYOGS BRGYAD RGYAS, ,'GRO KUN YUM CHEN GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
